name: torrents.net.ua cleaner
css:
@namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);

@-moz-document domain("torrents.net.ua") {
   iframe,
   noscript,
   div[class*="spacer_"],
   div[id*="lx_"],
   div[id*="MarketGid"],
   div[id*="bn_"],
   div[id*="beacon_"],
   div[id*="tradeone_"],
   div[align="center"],
   table[style*="table-layout: auto"],
   a[href*="http://www.webody.ru/"],
   img[src*="http://www.webody.ru/"],
   a[href*="http://b.torrents.net.ua/"],
   img[src*="http://b.torrents.net.ua/"],
   *[z-index],
   td[width="60%"] > center > a[target="_blank"],
   *[id*="krtn"],
   *[id*="kartinka"],
   *[class*="krtn"],
   *[class*="kartinka"],
   *[href*="kartinka.com.ua/"],
   *[src*="kartinka.com.ua/"],
   tr[id*="adblock_"],
   div#daos,
   /* below go rules for the new site design */
   div[style="background: #176093; width: 100%; top: 0; left: 0; height: 175px; position:absolute"],
   div#page_header > table,
   div[class="copyright tCenter"],
   html > body > p[align="center"] > font[color="#999999"],
   html > body > table.forumline
   {
     display: none !important;
   }
/*
   div#lightbox + div,
   table[width="99%"][border="0"][align="center"][cellspacing="0"][cellpadding="0"],
*/
}
